section.title: Screenshots
section.p: Welcome to our SuperTux screenshots album!

subsection.title: SuperTux Milestone1 aka 0.1.0
subsection.p: Milestone1 is in huge parts the result of the GotM event on happypenguin.org, it contains completly new graphics and lots of new levels and also a story and a worldmap. Screenshots below should give you an impression of the game.

subsection.title: SuperTux 0.0.6
subsection.p: Some shots from our lastest work (0.0.6), released at March 15, 2004. Basically this was a code clean-up version. Features a leveleditor and an OpenGL front-end. Menu as improved a lot, and fonts were also remade.

subsection.title: SuperTux 0.0.5
subsection.p: A couple of shots from our 0.0.5 release, released at December 29, 2003. Graphics were improved a lot. Also this version features a menu, and internal clean-ups have started.

subsection.title: SuperTux prior 0.0.5
subsection.p: Wow! These are really ancients shots from versions prior to 0.0.5. Graphics were a bit ugly, but it was already playble and had a SuperMario1 feel.
